imdb.plot outline: Singletons is a new Irish series following the lives of 4 girls in their 20s in modern Dublin. From struggling to pay the rent, to falling for the wrong guy, Ashley, Laura, Tara and Katie come together to talk about sex, work, money and bitches. This risqué show will delve into the world of sex in your 20s, from awkward encounters to kinky habits. Think Girls and Sex and The City mixed together with Dublin city as our very own New York City. In a world of Facebook updates, Selfies, Twitter followers and Skype sex, these four single girls need each other more than ever.
imdb.title: Singletons
plot: _Singletons_ (qv) is a new Irish series following the lives of 4 girls in their 20s in modern Dublin. From struggling to pay the rent, to falling for the wrong guy, Ashley, Laura, Tara and Katie come together to talk about sex, work, money and bitches. This risqué show will delve into the world of sex in your 20s, from awkward encounters to kinky habits. Think Girls and Sex and The City mixed together with Dublin city as our very own New York City. In a world of Facebook updates, Selfies, Twitter followers and Skype sex, these four single girls need each other more than ever.::Ali Rose
